Hello,
Thank you for your recent application for a Mobil Card Account. After careful consideration of the details you have provided and an assessment of your overall circumstances, unfortunately we are unable to provide you with a credit facility on this occasion.
Yours sincerely,
Rick Rose Managing Director WEX Australia
